snippet: The announcement appeared to further strengthen the role of Islamic militants in the Syrian insurgency.
abstract: Iraq’s branch of Al Qaeda says it has merged with Nusra Front, group of jihadists fighting to topple President Bashar al-Assad of Syria; move appears to strengthen role of Islamic militants in Syrian insurgency and further complicate Western assistance efforts.

byline.original: By HANIA MOURTADA and RICK GLADSTONE

lead_paragraph: The announcement appeared to further strengthen the role of Islamic militants in the Syrian insurgency.

headline.seo: Iraqi Branch of Al Qaeda Merges With Syria Jihadists
headline.main: Iraq’s Branch of  Al Qaeda Merges With Syria Jihadists
headline.print_headline:
Syria: Iraq Qaeda Group Merges
With Syrian Islamist Rebel Faction

keywords.value: National Coalition of Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces
